column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////i work close to this location but have not been here in sometime.  i forgot how great malnatis is.   its deep dish but not overly so...great sauce and the personal pan malnati is really great lunch option.  sat at the bar and collin c was bartender
column3: respectful guy who makes friendly chat in best way possible.  really enjoyable lunch...ill be back with friends again soon...and thx collin c.  great job!
